text: After placing my order with a gentleman who had no idea what was on any of their pizzas I got a call back saying that delivery would be 2 hours due to only one delivery driver. I then said I would just pick it up and instead of the delivery …More

name: Jason Nash
text: The staff were friendly and courteous.  However, maybe it was an off day, but it was easily the worst pizza I've had in Reno.  We're not exactly a pizza town (more of a terrific sandwich city), but I won't be going back. …More

text:
Came it to enjoy some pizza left eating 1 slice. Pizza was dry then when fresh came out it tasted like cardboard frozen pizza. I am not coming back here.
Round Table is still #1.!!!!!!!!!!

text: After reading many reviews, I was skeptical about ordering food from this Pizza Factory because I have had bad luck with other locations the past few times I've visited them (Fernley/Fallon). Well, I ordered anyway and being extremely …More

text: First timer here. Pizza and wings was delicious!!! And I like that they got ginger ale to drink. That was one of my favorites

text: This place is a complete joke. I placed an order at 9am and waited patiently for the restaurant to open at 11am. I even requested a change to  my order which was confirmed by BOTH phone and email. I find out 40 minutes after my order was …More

text: I love the pizza factory on clear acre lane. Great pizza and great employees.

name: Jamie Hicks
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Ordered online at 6:22 like I have before and it quoted that it would arrive at 7:07 pm. Waited until 7:30 and decided to call to see what was going on. No explanation of what happens just a " we're working …More

text: Haven't had pizza factory in years but ordered the other day and taste hasn't change much. Good pizza at a good price.

text: Not a great place to eat... pizza is mediocre, salad bar was empty and had old lettuce in it, half the sodas were out, also, not a clean place, tables not bussed, staff is friendly, but does not seem to be working. Lots of people behind the …More

text: Very good pizza compared to most.  It’s worth the money.

name: Michele Cardenas
text: Went for pizza buffet, the pizza ran out and there was no food for us to eat. Salad bar had brown gross stuff in it. Seemed as if food had been sitting out for a while. The sauce was all settled. Place was dirty. It was very dissappointing

name: Joseph O
text: Extremely poor delivery my house is literally 5 minutes away from the place and we ordered a delivery which then took an hour and a half to get here. Then when we called the place again they told us the delivery driver came to the door which was complete bulls*** because we have dogs who would've gone crazy!!!

name: Michael Moreno
text: Pizza was great staff was friendly. Pizza buffet was a resy nice experience.

name: Travis Shade
text: Solid lunch buffet- pizza was the right temperature and wasn't old/dry. They seemed to have removed the soup optn however, and I would have liked some kind of sweet item for dessert.

name: Lori Freeman
text: Took my family there and it was terrible. They overcharged me to start with and the service was poor to say the least. The topping on the pizza just fell off the pizza as they didn't even put cheese on top to keeping toppings on. Veggies were raw too! Won't ever go back. When you spend $60 for lunch it should be worth it.

name: Kevin Tyler
text: This place was great when it first opened. Now everyone just stands around and is very rude. They act like you are bothering them.

text: Wolf Pack. Best darn pizza hands down.

text: 'Wolfpack' pizza very tasty...we ordered 2 salads as well... unfortunately it took the staff 15 minutes to clean and refill salad bar.

text: I ordered a pizza at 7:30, the estimated delivery time was 8:30. At 9:30 when I still hadn't gotten it I tried to call them and nobody answered all the way until 10pm when they closed. I paid with a card, so I am out the money, got no pizza, and it is too late to go anywhere else.
